string.value: #p2032001# looked in the crystal ball and told me that #r#o8140000##k has the other half of the kidnapping plan, masterminded by #p2020008#. #o8140000#? That means #o8150000# and #o8140000# conspired together? Let's get the note that #o8140000# has and go back to #b#p2081100##k.\n\n#i4031477##t4031477# #b#c4031477# / 1#k
I went to Harmonia with the rest of the paper that I got from #o8140000#. Harmonia asked me to immediately go and protect Tylus. I'm on my way...
흠... #o8150000#에게서 얻은 이 문서를 살펴보니, 문서가 절반만 발견된 건, 혹시 이렇게 계획이 발각될 때를 대비해서 일부러 나눠 놓은 것이야. 그 녀석들 치고는 제법 머리를 썼군. 흥. 귀찮지만 #p2020008#를 모르는 것도 아니고 또 #p2081100#의 부탁도 있고 하니 나머지 문서에 대해서 찾아 주도록 하지. 그걸 원한 거겠지?
좋아. 그럼 수정구슬을 잠시 살펴볼까... 그래. #p2020008#를 납치 하려는 계획이 들어 있는 문서... 좋지 못한 목적으로 쓰여진 것이니 어두운 기운을 품은 것이 분명한 그런 문서... 그래. 그래. 좋아.
너도 들었지? 수정구슬이 말하길, 그 문서는 #b#t04031477##k가 가지고 있을 거라는군. 그럼 그걸 가지고 #b#p2081100##k에게 가 봐. 염치가 있다면 더 도와달라고는 안 하겠지? 이제 빨리 내 집에서 나가. 쓸데없는 데 시간을 써버렸군.
원하지 않다면 무엇하러 이 집에는 들어온 거야?

Hmm... Looking at the document from #o8150000#, I think they tore the document in half on purpose just in case their plot can be revealed. Smart. For the sake of #p2020008# and #p2081100#, I'll get the rest of the document. Are you with me in trying to stop this?
Good. Let me see the Crystal Marble. Oh no.. It is a plan to kidnap Tylus! The very thought of such a plan is surrounded by dark energy...
You heard that, didn't you? The crystal marble said that #b#o8140000##k had a document. Take the document and go to see #b#p2081100##k. I've helped you as much as I can.
If you don't want to stop it, then why are you here? Are you a spy? Hmm...
You came here to get the rest of the document. I'm surprised to hear #p2032001# helped you. Good. This will tell you #o8150000#'s half of the plan.
As you know, #p2020008# is almost staying in elder's official residence. There are four elders. Even though #o8150000# and #o8140000# aren't friendly, they're working together this time!

The elders sometimes go out... Hmmm. I can tell you as you completed the 4th job advancement. The elders sometimes go out for their secret mission. They know about it! It must be where they're planning the ambush!

You're involved in this too much. Please guard #bTylus#k. You don't have to protect him all by yourself. You can ask for help from your friends who've completed the 4th job advancement. So please protect #p2020008# with your friends.
Hmm? Didn't #p2032001# help you? She's willing to help anybody though she speaks in a rude manner.
